name: Cats on Mechs: Landfall!
description:
Cats on M.E.C.H.s: Landfall!

This game was created for the Epic Megajam 19, theme: Down to Earth

Join up for a 4 people total, in this light hearted local multiplayer first person arena shooter.

4 alien cats stuck on a space carrier about to crash land down to Earth, fight one another in futuristic badass mech suits.

Who's gonna get to take the last escape shuttle?!??

Controls ActionGamepadMouse + KeyboardMoveLeft Analog StickW A S DAimingRight Analog StickMouseShooting
[can Hold]Right TriggerLeft Mouse Click
Melee
XQJumpASpacebarForward DashBLeft ShiftPauseStart ButtonEscape Credits
